What your suezo is thinking...
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Filk Songs: What your suezo is thinking...
By RaystormX on Friday, March 4, 2005 - 09:12 pm:

Sing this to the tune of "the wheels on the bus go round and round"
My Trainer's mouth goes blah blah blah,
blah blah blah, blah blah,
My trainers mouth goes blah blah blah,
And I don't care!
I'm gonna go & cheat and steal,
Cheat and Steal, Cheat and steal
I'm gonna go & cheat and steal,
And get away with it alll!
I wanna get a hunk of meat,
a hunk of meat,
Darn all i got was po-ta-toes,
So i'll just steal it!
I'm gonna go and run away,
run away, run away,
I'm gonna go and run away,
And steal stuff on my wa-ay!
I'll come back and sell the ranch,
sell the ranch,
I'll come back and sell the ranch,
I'll sell it on E-Ba-ay!!!
__________________________________________________
Ha ha ha ha. I just thought i would base this on the suezos over all atitude and behavior. Imagine if you were training THIS suezo!lol!
